Row.Text: +25% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards purchasing [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings and +25% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings. It costs 50% more to Convert [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns into [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.

[BLIST][LI][B]+25%[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold[/B] towards purchasing [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] [B]Buildings[/B] and [B]+25% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production[/B] towards constructing [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] [B]Buildings[/B].[LI]It costs [B]50% more[/B] to convert [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] [B]Towns[/B] into [icon:YIELD_CITIES] [B]Cities[/B].[LI][B]+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Battersea Power Station[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Great Britain's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
